name: Dark Google Docs - clean
description:
Simple and clean style for Google Docs. They never looked better.

Current version: 2.3

Please, post any bugs, suggestions or questions in comments. I'll try to respond as soon as I'll have some time.
additional_info:
Version 1
 • Affecting only opened google document and its controls

Version 2
 • Now affects main page too (a bit more than it did before (by accident) and fixed some bugs).

Version 2.1
 • Comments are being affected too.

Version 2.2
 • Bug fixes (fixed some white spaces in comments)

Version 2.3
 • Material design update
